price: 192. Dan (berhala) itu tidak dapat memberikan pertolongan kepada penyembahnya, dan kepada dirinya sendiri pun mereka tidak dapat memberi pertolongan.
arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yastaṭīʿūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūna
